note:
Software developer, Mastodon instance owner/operator, work avoider. Linux,yes please. Also completely normal human male dad husband person,residing in #SouthAfrica

Fair warning to anybody considering following this account:
It will be an erratic , often boring,some times wild ride.
Memes will feature. Nonsense will be spouted, and rants will be issued.
Humor will probably be supplied, but might not be to everyone's taste.

I would probably not follow me.

Feel free to flee anytime.
